message.content:
cs.AI, cs.CL, cs.MA, cs.HC, cs.GR 

Reasoning: The paper presents a novel approach for generating verbal interactions between virtual agents and user avatars in shared virtual environments using natural language processing and propositional planning. This work involves artificial intelligence (cs.AI) techniques such as planning and natural language processing, as well as human-computer interaction (cs.HC) and graphics (cs.GR) for creating shared virtual environments. Additionally, the paper discusses a user study, which falls under the category of human-computer interaction (cs.HC). The use of natural language processing also suggests that the paper could fall under the category of computational linguistics (cs.CL). Finally, the use of multiple agents and avatars suggests that the paper could also fall under the category of multi-agent systems (cs.MA).
